description: The electric carmaker has been clearing forest to make way for a 'Gigafactory' close to Berlin.
title: Tesla: German court halts factory plan over snake and lizard habitats
title_page: Tesla: German court halts factory plan over snake and lizard habitats - BBC News
maintext: The environmentalist groups say Tesla's deforestation will destroy the habitats of sand lizards and smooth snakes, both of which are protected species. They have also expressed concern that the building work will disturb these reptiles during their winter hibernation.
